text: Emmanuelle Grey "Emmy" Rossum (born September 12, 1986) is an American actress. She is best known for her roles as Laura Chapman in the 2004 movie The Day After Tomorrow and as Christine Daae in The Phantom of the Opera. She now plays Fiona Gallagher in the comedy-drama televisions series Shameless. == Other websites == * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Emmy Rossum
